net.happybrackets.device.sensors

Class Accelerometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.device.sensors.Sensor
      • net.happybrackets.device.sensors.Accelerometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccelerometerSensor

    public class Accelerometer
extends Sensor
implements AccelerometerSensor
    Default Accelerometer for HB. The type of accelerometer will be detected and listeners will register to receive Accelerometer events

      • resetToDefault

        public void resetToDefault()
        Remove all rounding
        Overrides:
        resetToDefault in class Sensor

      • setRounding

        public Accelerometer setRounding(int resolution)
        Set the resolution for all three axis to the number of decimal places set by resolution. A value of -1 will remove rounding
        Parameters:
        resolution - the number of decimal places to round to. -1 will be no rounding
        Returns:
        this object

      • setXRounding

        public void setXRounding(int resolution)
        Set the resolution for X axis to the number of decimal places set by resolution. A value of -1 will remove rounding
        Parameters:
        resolution - the number of decimal places to round to. -1 will be no rounding

      • setYRounding

        public void setYRounding(int resolution)
        Set the resolution for Y axis to the number of decimal places set by resolution. A value of -1 will remove rounding
        Parameters:
        resolution - the number of decimal places to round to. -1 will be no rounding

      • setZRounding

        public void setZRounding(int resolution)
        Set the resolution for Z axis to the number of decimal places set by resolution. A value of -1 will remove rounding
        Parameters:
        resolution - the number of decimal places to round to. -1 will be no rounding
